Akane Lize

Korean: 아카네 리제

StelLive
Group (2024-present):
Universe

Introduction

Akane Lize is a South Korean V-Tuber and singer under Accelers. She is a member of the South Korean VTuber group StelLive and part of the subunit: 2nd Generation 'Universe'. She debuted as a soloist on September 29, 2024 with the digital single ''Festa!''.

Her birth year is unknown, but the date is known to be October 1.
